entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 06:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early this morning. Blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
